mdRecord.dcterms:title: Delegates of the Republic of Liberia Centennial Commission sign the guest book in the Dining Room at Mount Vernon, November 26, 1946
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of delegates of the Republic of Liberia Centennial Commission signing the guest book in the Dining Room at Mount Vernon. The photographer's stamp on the reverse reads: Please credit Turner, Jr. Specialized Photographer, U. S. and Foreign Distribution, 1934 - 11th St. N. W., Washington 1, D. C., U.S.A.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
